title: Scarlett Moffatt's ex Lee Wilkinson will be on Take Me Out
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

His relationship with Scarlett Moffatt might not have worked out but that hasn’t made Lee Wilkinson shy away trying to find love in a very public way.

Scarlett Moffatt’s ex is one of the chaps appearing on Take Me Out in a bid to head over to the Isle of Fernando’s for a blissful date with a gorgeous lady.

And the body-builder seems pretty keen to walk away with his leading lady if a teaser of his appearance is anything to go by.

Advertisement

‘I’ve always done well with girls, my last girlfriend was pretty well known, former queen of the jungle Scarlett Moffatt,’ Lee explained in a pre-recorded clip.

‘We were together six months but it all got a bit too intense too quickly. Although it didn’t end well we are still friends.

‘So come on girls, who wants to be my new queen of the jungle,’ he concluded.

Scarlett Moffat and Lee Wilkinson split in 2018 and now he’s looking for love on Take Me Out (Picture: BACKGRID)

Scarlett and Lee had previously split in April last year with Scarlett labelling him a ‘pathological liar’.

‘Just always seem to choose cheating pathological liars. I just choose lying cheats it’s a skill,’ she said.

Time will tell if it was a no likey, no lighty scenario across the board for the hopeful chap when his appearance airs tonight.

Also in the love lift this week hoping for a date are body-building stripper James, farmer Berty and gymnast Raymond.

Take Me Out returns on Saturday 26 November at 7:15pm on ITV.
